summary: WHILE ON A ROAD TRIP I STARTED GETTING THE RED LIGHT THAT ASKED ME TO STOP CAR TO LOW. I STOPPED AND IT PUMPED UP AGAIN. DROVE A COUPLE OF MILES AND IT DID SAME THING. TOOK TO MB DEALER THEY SAID IT WAS THE SUSPENSION AND CHARGED ME AROUND 1200.00. 2 DAYS LATER SAME PROBLEM IT HAD NOT BEEN FIXED. I NEED TO RETURN AND HAVE THEM RE-CHECK. I HEARD NEGATIVE FEED BACK ABOUT THIS CAR FROM DAY 1.  *TR
